control.name: comboBoxAnimationType
control.description: This editor allows you to choose the animation type. Depending on the selected type, the animation image can either be taken from the currently applied DevExpress skin, or consist of simple elements (dots, squares, triangles) moving according to the selected pattern (in circles or along a horizontal axis).

control.name: spinElementCount
control.description: Specifies the total amount of animation elements (dots).

control.name: spinAcceleration
control.description: Specifies the animation acceleration (9.0 by default).

control.name: spinSpeed
control.description: Use this editor to set the animation speed (7.0 by default).

control.name: spinLineHeight
control.description: This editor allows you to specify the height of line animation elements.

control.name: comboBoxLineElementType
control.description: Use this combo box to choose the desired animation elements' shape.

control.name: spinRingDiameter
control.description: Specifies the diameter of the circle in which animation elements move (40 by default).

control.name: spinFrameCount
control.description: This editor specifies the amount of frames, used for the current animation. Together with the frame interval setting, this affects the animation quality (high values may affect the performance but make the animation look smoother).

control.name: spinFrameInterval
control.description: This editor specifies the time interval required to change one animation frame with the following one. Together with the frame count setting, this affects the animation quality (high values may affect the performance but make the animation look smoother).

control.name: colorEditElementColor
control.description: Sets the color of animation elements.
